title: This apartment to move with family
posting_body: Awesome 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apt in Cedar Rapids.
with private garage short drive to Street.
Spacious Living Room with a large windows allowing for natural lighting.
Neutral colors throughout, with new wood floors water heater, roof and HVAC.
Tile and vinyl "wood" floors.
Open great room has richly hued wood floors and a fireplace anchoring one end.
A jewel-box kitchen with Quartz countertops, glass-front cabinetry and a sparkling stainless Samsung gas range is perfectly efficient and pleasantly bright.
This cottage offers the option of single level living with a corner first floor suite.
Good closet space.
Washer & Dryer included.
The fireplace is for looks only ... non-functioning.
Non-smokers only.
A small pet may be considered with deposit.
No dogs over 20lbs or aggressive breeds.
No smoking.
One year lease preferred.
Those with prior evictions will not be considered.
Call to make an appointment.
Additional features include: Full house generator, water filter, new kitchen, electric car plug, fenced in yard, dog door.
partially finished full basement.
Available August.
One Year Lease, No Dogs, No brokers.
